wrath.common.world

Class TerrainTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.common.world.TerrainTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TerrainTile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to manage world data in smaller tiles.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • TerrainTile

        public TerrainTile(Vector3f location,
                   World world,
                   int vertexCount)
        Creates a Tile in specified world.
        Parameters:
        location - The Vector3f representation of this Tile's location in the World.
        world - The World this Tile belongs to. Can be null.
        vertexCount - The number of verticies present in this Tile.

        Parameters:

        y - The Y-position of the tile.

      • setVertex

        public void setVertex(int x,
                      int y,
                      Vector3f vertex)
        Changes the Vertex data of a single vertex in the tile.
        Parameters:
        x - The X-position of the tile.
        y - The Y-position of the tile.
        vertex - The new Vertex data in Vector3f format.
